component.name: Slider
component.description: Draggable range input for selecting numeric values or ranges.

useCases: Selecting a single numeric value within a range
Selecting a min-max range with two thumbs
Adjusting volume, brightness, or opacity settings
Filtering by price range or numeric bounds

commonPatterns.name: single-value
commonPatterns.description: Single thumb slider for one value

commonPatterns.name: range-selection
commonPatterns.description: Two-thumb slider for selecting a range

commonPatterns.name: with-label
commonPatterns.composition: <InlineField label="Volume"><Slider value={[volume]} onValueChange={(val) => setVolume(val[0])} min={0} max={100} className="w-48" /></InlineField>

antiPatterns.scenario: Using Slider for precise numeric input
antiPatterns.reason: Sliders are imprecise by nature — users cannot easily select exact values
antiPatterns.alternative: Use Input type="number" for precise values, or pair Slider with a numeric display

antiPatterns.scenario: Using Slider with a very large range and no step
antiPatterns.reason: Tiny per-pixel increments make the control unusable for selecting meaningful values
antiPatterns.alternative: Set an appropriate step value relative to the range

parentConstraints: Set an explicit width (horizontal) or height (vertical) on the slider or its parent

interactions.drag: Drag thumb(s) along the track to change value
interactions.click-track: Click on the track to jump the nearest thumb to that position
interactions.hover: Thumb shows a focus ring preview on hover
interactions.focus: 4px ring appears on thumb via focus-visible

responsive.mobile: Touch-friendly thumb size (16px); full-width in containers
responsive.desktop: Mouse and keyboard control; can be fixed-width

accessibility.keyboardSupport: Arrow keys to increment/decrement; Home/End for min/max; Tab between thumbs
accessibility.screenReader: Announces current value, min, max; each thumb is independently accessible
accessibility.focusManagement: Focus ring on active thumb; Tab moves between multiple thumbs

rules: Value must be an array — single value as [n], range as [min, max]
Number of thumbs is determined by the length of the value/defaultValue array
Vertical orientation requires setting a min-height (min-h-44 applied by default)
Track uses bg-muted; filled range uses bg-primary; thumb is white with primary border

aiHints.context: Use Slider for selecting numeric values or ranges via drag interaction. Supports single-thumb and multi-thumb configurations. Built on Radix Slider primitive with full keyboard and screen reader support. For precise numeric entry, pair with an Input or use Input type="number" instead.
